summary: Question/quiz flow app that persists selected answers across questions and provides end-of-quiz subject-wise and overall student rankings.
known_issues: Selected answers are not being retained/saved when moving to the next question; end-of-quiz review/results cannot reflect prior answers reliably.

existing_features.title: Update the practice question flow so that when a student submits an answer and moves (slides) to the next question, the previously selected answer is retained for that question and is available at the end of the session for review (including when navigating back to previous questions using the question navigator).

Implement an end-of-session results/review experience that displays the studentâ€™s saved answers for the completed session (question-by-question) using authoritative data from the backend test result created on submission.

Add subject-wise ranking and overall ranking of all students. Overall ranking should continue to work as a global leaderboard, and subject-wise ranking should rank students using subject-specific performance aggregated from submitted test results.

new_feature_requests.summary: Persist/save each selected answer when user advances to the next question so previous answers remain stored for the session/result.
Add results/ranking view showing subject-wise ranking of all students and overall ranking.

projectName: Persist answers across question navigation and add subject-wise + overall student rankings
